headline: NYLI CBRE Global Infrastructure Megatrends Term Fund (NYSE: MEGI) Declares Monthly Distributions for December 2025, January and February 2026 and Availability of 19(a) Notice
summary: NEW YORK, December 12, 2025--NYLI CBRE Global Infrastructure Megatrends Term Fund (the "Fund") (NYSE: MEGI) today declared three distributions of $0.1250 per common share for the months of December 2025 and January and February 2026. The Fund’s current annualized distribution rate is 11.10% based upon the closing price of $13.51 on December 10, 2025, and 9.89% based upon the Fund’s closing NAV of $15.16 as of the same date.
